title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2162.4 - Permissible forms of financial assistance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2162.4 - Permissible forms of financial assistance

State Regulations

The corporation is authorized to provide grants to selected
eligible applicants. Grantees may allocate funds in the form of grants, loans
or payments. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2162.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
